text:
NAEB HEADQUARTERS
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N.W.
Washington 6, D.C.
MEMORANDUM
TO: NAEB Board of Directors
FROM: Harold E. Hill
DATE: January 8, 1963
For your information - in the ballotting just completed,*-John
Schwarzwalder was elected Chairman of the Television Board and
Ken Kager was re-elected Chairman of the Radio Board.
Together with Dick Hull, Chairman of the Board of Directors, and
Bill Harley, President, these men make up the Executive Committee
of the Board.
HEH:atb
